short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetch bookmarks from your X account to use with Weave

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Weave is an AI assistant that will help you actually extract value from your X (twitter) bookmarks. We all collect bookmarks and do nothing with them. There is so much value in the things we find but actually finding what you need, when you need it isn't easy. Even if you remember to go back through your bookmarks there is still a lot of manual work required to turn them into actions you can take to drive your goals forward.

The goal for weave is to provide an assistant that can do some of that heavy lifting for you. We will be adding tools and capabilities to the assistant over time to make the most common tasks as easy as possible - or even completely automate them for you. Weave is your PA for bookmarks.

This extension is required to sync your bookmarks into the weave platform. Once they are there you will be able to put them to work. You can:
- Chat with your bookmarks to expand on ideas and provide you with missing background that may help your understanding
- Search your bookmarks for keywords, author or even just general concepts.
- Ask weave to carry out tasks on your bookmarks
